sqlMap.select: SELECT A.YEAR, A.MON, A.RSLT_CNT, A.DEPT_CD, C.DEPT_NM FROM ( SELECT YEAR, MON, DEPT_CD, SUM (RSLT_CNT) RSLT_CNT FROM V_GBM0501D_001 A GROUP BY YEAR, MON, DEPT_CD ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN V_DEPTINFO C ON A.DEPT_CD = C.DEPT_ID WHERE A.YEAR = #findYear# AND A.MON = #findMon# GROUP BY A.YEAR, A.MON, C.DEPT_NM, A.RSLT_CNT, A.DEPT_CD, C.DEPT_NM
SELECT B.YY AS YEAR, B.BR_CD AS DEPT_CD, C.DEPT_NM, B.PLAN_AMT FROM V_GBM0501M_001 B LEFT OUTER JOIN V_DEPTINFO C ON B.BR_CD = C.DEPT_ID WHERE B.YY = #findYear# AND B.PLAN_AMT IS NOT NULL

SELECT A.ITEM_CD, B.CAL_TYPE_COL_NM FROM BSC_SYSTEM_ITEM A , BSC_CAL_TYPE_COL B WHERE A.YEAR = #findYear# AND A.YEAR = B.YEAR AND A.ITEM_CD = B.ITEM_CD AND B.METRIC_ID = #findMetricId# AND B.INSERT_GUBUN = '01' ORDER BY B.CAL_TYPE_COL_NM
SELECT DEPT_ID FROM ( SELECT DEPT_ID FROM BSC_SC_DEPT_MAPPING WHERE YEAR = #findYear# AND SC_DEPT_ID = #findScDeptCd# ORDER BY DEPT_ID ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT A.DEPT_ID, B.DEPT_NM FROM BSC_SC_DEPT_MAPPING A LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_DEPTINFO B ON A.DEPT_ID = B.DEPT_ID WHERE (YEAR, SC_DEPT_ID) IN (SELECT YEAR, SC_DEPT_ID FROM BSC_METRIC WHERE (METRIC_GRP_ID, YEAR) IN (SELECT METRIC_GRP_ID, YEAR FROM BSC_METRIC WHERE YEAR = #findYear# AND METRIC_ID = #findMetricId#) AND DELETE_DT IS NULL)

SELECT A.YEAR, A.MON, A.RSLT_CNT, A.DEPT_CD, C.DEPT_NM FROM ( SELECT YEAR, MON, DEPT_CD, SUM (TIME_RSLT_CNT) RSLT_CNT FROM V_GBM0501D_002 A GROUP BY YEAR, MON, DEPT_CD ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN V_DEPTINFO C ON A.DEPT_CD = C.DEPT_ID WHERE A.YEAR = #findYear# AND A.MON = #findMon# AND C.DEPT_ID = #findDeptId# GROUP BY A.YEAR, A.MON, C.DEPT_NM, A.RSLT_CNT, A.DEPT_CD, C.DEPT_NM
